morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.caseExplained: they are having something done to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.caseDescription: that is having something done to them
morphInfos.description: give them a woman that _is done_ good_ by herself_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is done to or for a female person or thing that is having something done to them
